page.title: 12The V.A. Primary School
page.content: A split site, one building, dated l87l, is on the village green. The other building is next to the Village Hall and recreation ground. Built in l975, it houses the infant section. At the old end the playground is tarmac, and is used by the netball team. Football, cricket and rounders are played on the grass pitch at the new end, where there is also a shallow swimming pool. Athletics, chess, drama and cycling proficiency are amongst the after-school clubs. There are lll children in 4 classes at the school, and about half have sandwiches. The cooked lunch yesterday was egg and cheese salad followed by chocolate sponge and custard. Playground games include football, skipping, stilt-walking, padder-tennis, and playing on the climbing frame and in the sandpit.
